mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id, c.user_id as user_id, c.post_id as post_id, c.content as content, c.time as time, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.picture as user_picture FROM comment as c LEFT JOIN user as u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (user_id, post_id, content) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{post_id}, #{content})
